com.jswiff.swfrecords
Class CXformWithAlpha

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.CXformWithAlpha
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class CXformWithAlpha
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This record defines a simple transform that can be applied to the color space and the alpha channel of an object.

See Also:
Serialized Form

hasAddTerms

public boolean hasAddTerms()
Checks if the transform has additive terms.

Returns:
true if additive terms contained

hasMultTerms

public boolean hasMultTerms()
Checks if the transform has multiplicative terms.

Returns:
true if multiplicative terms contained

setAddTerms

public void setAddTerms(int redAddTerm,
                        int greenAddTerm,
                        int blueAddTerm,
                        int alphaAddTerm)
Sets the transform's additive terms. After addition, the result is truncated at 255 if greater than 255 and at 0 if negative.

Parameters:
redAddTerm - red term
greenAddTerm - green term
blueAddTerm - blue term
alphaAddTerm - alpha term

setMultTerms

public void setMultTerms(int redMultTerm,
                         int greenMultTerm,
                         int blueMultTerm,
                         int alphaMultTerm)
Sets the transform's multiplicative terms. The terms are 8.8 fixed point values (i.e. 256 corresponds to 1.0, after multiplication the result is divided by 256).

Parameters:
redMultTerm - red term
greenMultTerm - green term
blueMultTerm - blue term
alphaMultTerm - alpha term

write

public void write(OutputBitStream stream)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes the transform to a bit stream.

Parameters:
stream - the target bit stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occured
